description: SANOXY is trademarked brand. Exclusively marketed by authorized resellers on amazon.com. SANOXY offers variety of consumer technology solutions such as cables & adapters, computer networking devices, and Touch Screen Smart Phone Accessories, Presentation and Stylus Pens. SANOXY premium quality pu leather case supports smart cover capability: automatically wakes on open and sleeps on close, it also features a unique design with a 360 swivel that allows the iPad 2 to rotate in portrait or landscape position while in the case. 360 degree case can easily switch from a vertical viewing position to a comfortable horizontal typing position. Full access to all functions while in the case Easy & quick installation: snap on left part of iPad 2, then right All of the iPad 2 and iPad 3 ports, buttons, speakers, and cameras are visible and accessible with the case on High quality case built specifically to fit the Apple iPad 2 and 3 Smart cover to sleep saving you battery life Apple iPad is registered trademarks of Apple, Inc. Products are Apple compatible and not endorsed by Apple, Inc.
title: SANOXY® 360-degree Swivel Leather Case Compatible with Apple iPad 2/3/4 WHITE
